inlineContent.text: Yesterday I started developing a new morning habit of meditation. I’m keeping it simple so I’ll stick with it. I sit somewhere for 5 minutes with my eyes closed and try to focus on my breath while letting other thoughts pass through my mind. I set an alarm on my phone so I know when 5 minutes are up. I find that setting a strict amount of time is critical to actually following through with a habit consistently. Any ambiguity will quickly pull a new habit apart.

abstract.text: David Brunow, known as Brunow [ˈbɹunoʊ] to the folks he works with, is a human living on Earth. You might have something in common with him — if you think it is ridiculous that he is talking about himself in the first person here, so does he.
